stories.headline: Drilling for lease deals
stories.summary: An investigation into oil and gas leasing on federal lands, highlighting the major players and examining if industry rules are followed.

stories.headline: Diving deep into marine park problems
stories.summary: A look into issues faced by marine mammals in captivity at U.S. marine parks, revealing deaths and inadequate care.

stories.headline: Data helps probe death on the tracks
stories.summary: An examination of rail-crossing safety following a fatal train accident, using data to reveal maintenance lapses.

stories.headline: Reservation deaths uncovered with data
stories.summary: An investigation into the high death rates of children at the Warm Springs Reservation in Oregon, using state databases.
